adjectives.description: associable (comparative more associable, superlative most associable)

entries.meaning: Capable of being associated or joined.
examples: We know feelings to be associable only by the proved ability of one to revive another.

entries.meaning: (medicine, obsolete) Liable to be affected by sympathy with other parts; said of organs, nerves, muscles, etc.
examples: the stomach, the most associable of all the organs of the animal body
